item.title: Introduction to ARM Architecture
item.description: Introduction to ARM Architecture ARM is a widely-used architecture in various devices due to its efficiency and power-saving features. Understanding ARM assembly provides you with the ability to write low-level code that directly interacts with hardware. ARM Versions ARM has several versions, including ARMv7 (32-bit) and ARMv8 (64-bit). Each version introduces new instructions and capabilities.
